title: The Chain Reaction
creator_credit: Ian Barry, Ross Matthews and Palm Beach Pictures
brief_description: A thriller in which a married couple are thrown into a world of terror, after being contaminated with radioactivity. Cast includes Steve Bisley, Hugh Keays-Byrne, Lorna Lesley. Photography by Nixon Binney.
